description: Spacious 1-bedroom apartments. 200$ for three nights booking. Perfect for family with a child. Located in Upper West Side of Manhattan, 10 min walk to subway stations. Two large public parks & Columbia University are close to the building.
name: 1-bedroom apt in Manhattan
review: Perfect location if you're planning on seeing Harlem, Uptown, Upper West Side, Central Park, and Columbia University. Minutes walk away from the 1 and D trains. Easy to get to Midtown as well on the D train on 125th or on the 1. The host did more than i expected. Full access to kitchen as well. Great stay!
